Name: MHA1
Label: Ever heard of AIDS
Question:
Now i would like to talk with you about something else.
Have you ever heard of the HIV virus or an illness called AIDS (or SIDA)?

Name: MHA2
Label: Can avoid AIDS virus by having one uninfected partner
Question: Can people reduce their chance of getting the virus that causes AIDS by having just one uninfected sex partner who has no other sex partners?

Name: MHA3
Label: Can get AIDS virus through supernatural means
Question: Can people get the virus that causes AIDS because of witchcraft or other supernatural means?

Name: MHA4
Label: Can avoid AIDS virus by using a condom correctly every time
Question: Can people reduce their chance of getting the virus that causes AIDS by using a condom every time they have sex?

Name: MHA5
Label: Can get AIDS virus from mosquito bites
Question: Can people get the virus that causes AIDS from mosquito bites?

Name: MHA6
Label: Can get AIDS virus by sharing food with a person who has AIDS

Label: Healthy-looking person may have AIDS virus

Label: AIDS virus from mother to child during pregnancy

Name: MHA8B
Label: AIDS virus from mother to child during delivery
Question: Can the virus that causes AIDS be transmitted from a mother to her baby: [B] During delivery?

Name: MHA8C
Label: AIDS virus from mother to child through breastfeeding

Name: MHA12

Name: MHA27
